column4: is it possible to run an application with wine if it is not installed using wine but sitting in your windows program files?
I don't think so, but I don't usually use wine.
Please read and search: http://ubuntuforums.org/   That's how I learned.
Another great link, if you're just getting started is: http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/index.php
Or zenmap if you prefer gui of nmap.
